titles.title: Harmful Algal Bloom and Hypoxia Research and Control Amendments Act of 2017
Harmful Algal Bloom and Hypoxia Research and Control Amendments Act of 2017
A bill to amend the Harmful Algal Bloom and Hypoxia Research and Control Act of 1998 to address harmful algal blooms, and for other purposes.
Harmful Algal Bloom and Hypoxia Research and Control Amendments Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
